column1: Saw posts of people living their normal lives in countries with no Corona Virus and im so jealous. Going out, socializing, mask free must be lekker

Police Horses Crash Socially-Distant Salsa Lesson In Adorable Video.: As the novel coronavirus pandemic continues, dance […] The post Police Horses Crash Socially-Distant Salsa Lesson In Adorable Video. appeared first on InspireMore. http://dlvr.it/RXgcjx
I’m busy playing FIFA in my room, and my mom walks in with a plate of chopped onions and she’s like “here put this in your room, it’ll help protect you from getting coronavirus”
I think everyone watching that launch of Dragon & Falcon 9 just forgot about #coronavirus even if just for a few seconds.
